医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
营养进步停滞：大多数国家落后于 2030 年目标全球实现营养目标的进展缓慢，很少有国家能够在 2030 年之前实现贫血、发育迟缓和儿童超重的目标，这凸显了制定长期、多部门战略的迫切需要。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241212/Nutrition-progress-stalls-Most-nations-lag-behind-2030-goals.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241212/Nutrition-progress-stalls-Most-nations-lag-behind-2030-goals.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c8ae8048-933b-49d1-9a2e-18c67bcf7bdd Thu, 12 Dec 2024 21:19:00 -0500 Nutrition progress stalls: Most nations lag behind 2030 goals
新研究揭示巨大的疾病负担，全球疱疹感染激增全球 HSV-1 和 HSV-2 估计揭示了令人震惊的疾病负担，2020 年将有 4240 万新生殖器疱疹病例和 88 亿 GUD 人日，这凸显了改进预防策略的迫切需要。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241212/Herpes-infections-soar-globally-as-new-study-reveals-massive-disease-burden.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241212/Herpes-infections-soar-globally-as-new-study-reveals-massive-disease-burden.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=7c2f24fa-8015-4c9d-ae89-e05dc3f94abd Thu, 12 Dec 2024 21:00:00 -0500 Herpes infections soar globally as new study reveals massive disease burden
美国女性转移性乳腺癌发病率激增，暴露了差异和大流行的影响2004 年至 2021 年 SEER 数据显示，美国女性的转移性乳腺癌诊断率正在上升，尤其是年轻群体和少数族裔。该研究强调了差异和 COVID-19 的影响，敦促进行系统性变革，以改善早期检测和医疗保健公平性。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241212/Metastatic-breast-cancer-rates-surge-across-US-women-exusing-disparities-and-pandemic-impacts.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241212/Metastatic-breast-cancer-rates-surge-across-US-women-exusing-disparities-and-pandemic-impacts.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=05ab4940-3b84-410f-af80-ba6f6265ead4 Thu, 12 Dec 2024 20:44:00 -0500 Metastatic breast cancer rates surge across U.S. women, exposing disparities and pandemic impacts
脂质失衡是结肠癌慢性炎症的关键科学家们揭示了脂质代谢紊乱如何加剧结直肠癌的慢性炎症，为针对促炎症和促进解决脂质失衡的新治疗策略提供了见解。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241212/Lipid-imbalances-hold-the-key-to-chronic-inflammation-in-colon-cancer.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241212/Lipid-imbalances-hold-the-key-to-chronic-inflammation-in-colon-cancer.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=afe876c5-d595-4ec2-9a17-a4984563ceed Thu, 12 Dec 2024 20:28:00 -0500 Lipid imbalances hold the key to chronic inflammation in colon cancer
代谢组生物标志物提高糖尿病风险预测的准确性研究人员开发了一种新型糖尿病风险评分，将传统因素与代谢组生物标志物相结合，提高了 10 年 2 型糖尿病风险的预测准确性。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241212/Metabolomic-biomarkers-improve-diabetes-risk-prediction-accuracy.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241212/Metabolomic-biomarkers-improve-diabetes-risk-prediction-accuracy.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f065db1b-ea19-42f6-af96-efd8b504e79b Thu, 12 Dec 2024 20:09:00 -0500 Metabolomic biomarkers improve diabetes risk prediction accuracy
昼夜节律混乱：交通噪音如何损害心脏健康交通噪音对心血管健康构成严重风险，导致炎症、氧化应激和昼夜节律紊乱，再加上空气污染的综合影响。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241212/Circadian-chaos-How-transportation-noise-harms-heart-health.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241212/Circadian-chaos-How-transportation-noise-harms-heart-health.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=6b5ec17e-e8d1-48d5-9cb6-eb30571db3a2 Thu, 12 Dec 2024 19:48:00 -0500 Circadian chaos: How transportation noise harms heart health
NIH 资金支持使用 DNA 模拟分子的创新狼疮研究狼疮给 150 万美国人带来慢性疼痛、疲劳和潜在的器官损伤，这对试图寻找更好治疗方法的研究人员来说是一个挑战。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241212/NIH-funding-supports-innovative-lupus-research-using-DNA-mimic-molecules.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241212/NIH-funding-supports-innovative-lupus-research-using-DNA-mimic-molecules.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=7d53290f-9285-430f-8915-66af6825515e Thu, 12 Dec 2024 16:14:31 -0500 NIH funding supports innovative lupus research using DNA mimic molecules
UMD 研究人员旨在揭开 Medicare Advantage 健康保险计划中的“幽灵网络”米卡·哈默博士即将去捉鬼。得益于罗伯特·约翰逊·伍德基金会 (RWJF) 的 10 万美元资助，马里兰大学公共卫生学院研究人员旨在揭示 Medicare Advantage 健康保险计划中所谓“幽灵网络”的范围。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241212/UMD-researcher-aims-to-uncover-ghost-networks-in-Medicare-Advantage-health-insurance-plans.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241212/UMD-researcher-aims-to-uncover-ghost-networks-in-Medicare-Advantage-health-insurance-plans.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d30388b0-16cf-4573-921f-a9fafbac40f9 Thu, 12 Dec 2024 16:08:33 -0500 UMD researcher aims to uncover "ghost networks" in Medicare Advantage health insurance plans
新研究确定了治疗糖尿病心肌病的潜在目标一些糖尿病患者会出现一种称为糖尿病心肌病的严重疾病，这种疾病进展缓慢，不能直接归因于高血压或其他心血管疾病。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241212/New-study-identizes-pottial-target-for-treating-diabetic-cardiomyopathy.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241212/New-study-identizes-pottial-target-for-treating-diabetic-cardiomyopathy.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=58297681-e466-4faf-8f92-23cbe8e66519 Thu, 12 Dec 2024 16:04:00 -0500 New study identifies potential target for treating diabetic cardiomyopathy
反复使用扑热息痛与老年人的健康风险有关由诺丁汉大学专家领导的新研究发现，65 岁及以上的人重复服用扑热息痛会导致胃肠道、心血管和肾脏并发症的风险增加。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241212/Repeated-paracetamol-use-linked-to-health-risks-in-older-adults.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241212/Repeated-paracetamol-use-linked-to-health-risks-in-older-adults.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=1d4e9280-01ca-4afb-b474-c6c77ef42ae0 Thu, 12 Dec 2024 16:00:09 -0500 Repeated paracetamol use linked to health risks in older adults
